title: Farm Friends
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 175 words, Level F (Grade 1), Lexile 290L, Fiction Series
description: Bonk visits Jupe's grandpa and grandma on a farm. Bonk is hesitant at first, but as it turns out, life on the farm is fun and delicious! Charming illustrations complement the text.
reviewWords: comes, cookies, farm, fences, growls, mall
